PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-09782011-09-26,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActCanada Revenue Agency Act
PrecisAppointment of ROBERT A. WRIGHT of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Deputy Commissioner of Revenue to be styled acting Commissioner of Revenue, to hold office during pleasure, for a term ending March 20, 2012, or until such time as a new Deputy Commissioner of Revenue is appointed, whichever is earlier.
